short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly generate shareable QR codes for desktop tabs, with download, copy, and regenerate options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing QR GenZ: a tool that quickly makes QR codes for the websites you're viewing on your computer. Just click, and you'll get a QR code that you can easily share. You can download it, copy it, or make a new one if needed. It's a super easy way to share links without any hassle. Try it out and see how simple it is!
